::Zardus::

Zardus nearly drops Nemesis as the missiles hit him. He growls. He'll need to 
speak to Hell Beast about that. Yes..... They would retreat and attack these 
new fools jointly with the predacons. He would have to convince the predacons 
that they are allies though. Most of them seemed to have forgotten.

He keeps flying toward the alliance base.
